name: AntiVir Job File
summary: Learn about .AVJ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: You can view and edit the list of AntiVir jobs in the software's user interface by selecting Administration → Scheduler. Each job shown in the resulting page is saved to an individual AVJ file following directory: ProgramData\​Avira\​Avira Desktop\​JOBS\​.

description: File used by AntiVir antivirus software for Windows; saved in a plain text format and contains the configuration information for a scheduled job, which may be for an antivirus scan or a software update.
